summary: This document consists of three daily lieutenant's logs from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York covering the evening of July 5, 2019, through the day of July 6, 2019. The logs detail routine prison operations, counts, and security checks. Notably, they record the movement of inmate Jeffrey Epstein (register number 76318-054) into unit 5N on July 5, 2019, and show he was under USMS guard at a local hospital. Another inmate was placed in administrative detention for an SIS investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054. Logged as being moved to unit 5N at 9:27 PM on July 5, 2019, and noted as being at a local hospital under USMS guard.

persons.name: Burnett
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76254-054. Logged as being at a local hospital under USMS guard at 12:39 AM on July 6, 2019.

events.title: Epstein moved to unit 5N
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein (register number 76318-054) was moved to unit 5N within the Metropolitan Correctional Center at 9:27 PM.

events.title: Inmate placed in Administrative Detention
events.description: An inmate with register number 50972-054 was placed in Administrative Detention at 9:15 AM due to an SIS investigation.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate (register number 76318-054) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York as of July 5-6, 2019.
On July 5, 2019, at 9:27 PM, Epstein was moved to unit 5N within the facility.
The logs indicate Epstein was under guard by the United States Marshals Service (USMS) at a local hospital during this period.
The logs show routine prison operations, including multiple inmate counts, security checks, and the placement of another inmate in administrative detention.
The document provides a detailed, time-stamped account of prison activities in the days leading up to Epstein's death on July 10, 2019.
